tasks.name: Chop Vegetables
tasks.description:
1. Chop 2 lb celery
2. Peel and slice 10 lb potatoes
3. Peel and cube 4 lb potatoes
4. Chop 4 lb onions
5. Peel and julienne 2 lb carrots
6. Peel and chop 2 lb carrots
7. Peel and dice 100 cloves garlic

tasks.name: Prepare Chicken Stock
tasks.description:
1. Add 5 lb poultry to large stock pot
2. Add 2 lb cubed potatoes
3. Add 2 lb chopped carrots
4. Add 1 lb chopped onions
5. Add 1 Tbsp peppercorns
6. Cover with water and bring to a boil
7. Reduce heat and simmer for 2 hours, skimming periodically
8. Strain broth and refrigerate

tasks.name: Grate Cheeses
tasks.description:
1. Grate and store 4 lb Parmesan
2. Grate and store 4 lb Mozzarella
3. Grate and store 2 lb Edam
4. Grate and store 6 lb Cheddar

tasks.name: Peel and Devein Shrimp
tasks.description:
For 10 lb large shrimp:
1. Peel shrimp
2. Remove tail
3. Devein shrimp

tasks.name: Stock Chef Workstations
tasks.description:
Equip each workstation with:
1. Sanitized cutting board
2. Knife block
3. Food processor
4. Large baking sheet

tasks.name: Empty Trash
tasks.description:
1. Remove and replace trashbags from chef workstations
2. Remove and replace trashbags from waitstaff dropoff area
3. Remove and replace trashbags from dishwashing area
4. Remove and replace trashbags from stockroom
5. Transport all collected bags to dumpster
